subject: Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: When Robert Cheruiyot of Kenya defends his title Sunday in the Chicago Marathon, he will receive a six-figure appearance fee, plus a chance at the first-place prize of $125,000 and a time bonus.
snippet: When Robert Cheruiyot of Kenya defends his title Sunday in the Chicago Marathon, he will receive a six-figure appearance fee, plus a chance at the first-place prize of $125,000 and a time bonus.
